name: Show the heading IDs in Userstyles help pages
description:
If you know the element ID, you can append it as a hash tag to the URL to go to that element directly, 
https://userstyles.org/help/coding#help-style-settings
takes you to 
<h2 id="help-style-settings">
This style shows you the IDs of the headings in Userstyles help pages which have them. Hover over the heading to see the hash tag. They're displayed as pseudo-elements, so you can't copy+paste them, but it's better than a poke in the eye.
